summary_text: Samsung's new Galaxy Book 3 Ultra laptop is a step up from the Book 2 Pro. The 16-inch screen has a higher resolution and 120Hz refresh rate. It's the only model to come with optional 5G wireless. Samsung also has the Book 3 Pro and Pro 360, which are a notch below the Ultra in performance.

The Samsung Galaxy Book 3 Ultra was announced today at Samsung's Unpacked product launch event. It improves upon its predecessor with an upgraded processor, graphics card, and display. The laptop's stunning 16-inch, 3K (2880 x 1800) display delivers 400 nits of brightness for visibility outdoors.
